name: @sweet-milktea/server-log
description: 服务端的koa日志中间件函数

scripts.start: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development tsc --watch
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc
scripts.test: npm run clean:sweet && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha ./tests/test.js --timeout 180000
